Name: Lightless Feeding
Title: All-Devouring Narwhal: Lightless Feeding
Desc: Phosphorescent creatures float all about the dark, moonless seas of dreams â€” perhaps they are as food for some titanic leviathan.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the All-Devouring Narwhal at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Lightless Feeding
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2204]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2204] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S22042]</color> once.
After your $[A2204], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S22042]</color> to $[K56] 1 card: Heal this character for that card's Elemental Dice Cost (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A2204] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
